hadiths.text: Mu’adhah reported :A woman asked ‘A’ishah: should a menstruating woman complete the prayer abandoned during the period of menses? ‘A’ishah said: Are you a Haruriyyah? During menstruation in the time of the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) we would not complete (the abandoned prayers), nor were we commanded to complete them

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْحَائِضِ لاَ تَقْضِي الصَّلاَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The Menstruating Woman Does Not Make Up The (Missed) Prayers
